AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: A brief introduction to who I am.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Le Minh Quang, a Frontend Developer passionate about building modern, user-friendly web applications. I especially enjoy working with React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to create clean, high-performance interfaces.
resume.paragraf_2: I focus on delivering smooth, efficient, and intuitive user experiences. Whether it's crafting pixel-perfect UI components or optimizing performance, I aim to bring clarity and consistency to every aspect of a project. I'm a fast learner who loves exploring new technologies to continually improve my skills.
resume.paragraf_3: I believe that great communication and teamwork are essential to success in software development. I'm always eager to collaborate, learn from others, and contribute to impactful projects that make a real difference.

ProjectsPage.title: Projects
ProjectsPage.description: A showcase of both private and open-source projects I've built or contributed to.
ProjectsPage.error: An error occurred on the server.

ticketresell.description: A dynamic event ticket reselling platform that allows users to buy and sell tickets quickly and securely. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, it features user authentication, real-time listings, and a responsive interface designed to enhance trust and create a seamless user experience.

ftech.description: An innovative e-commerce platform designed to deliver a seamless and secure shopping journey. Built with JSP, it supports real-time product updates, encrypted payment processing, and an intuitive interface that makes it easy for customers to browse, purchase, and track their orders efficiently.

goodmeal.description: An AI-powered food recommendation platform that suggests dishes and nearby restaurants based on mood prompts and location. Built on a microservices architecture with a Next.js frontend on AWS Amplify and .NET backend on ECS/EC2. Features natural-language mood analysis, location-aware search, and real-time recommendations.

ghepxe.description: A fast delivery platform connecting partner drivers with customers who need goods transported. Built with Next.js and MongoDB, the website introduces the service, outlines pricing, policies, and partner benefits, and enables drivers to register online through a simple and transparent onboarding process.

ghepxemobile.description: A mobile delivery app that connects drivers and customers in real time. Built with React Native and MongoDB, it includes features such as order creation, live GPS tracking, in-app wallet management, secure online payments, and a post-delivery review system, providing a reliable, efficient, and cost-effective experience.
